about_the_game: This DLC comes with a full Fox Racing livery, which represents the 180 Emotion set, available since this summer on the Fox Racing site.
detailed_description: This DLC comes with a full Fox Racing livery, which represents the 180 Emotion set, available since this summer on the Fox Racing site.

short_description: This DLC comes with a full Fox Racing livery, which represents the 180 Emotion set, available since this summer on the Fox Racing site.
